content.en: Dental imaging algorithms: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms in dental imaging to improve the accuracy of detecting various dental conditions. These algorithms, such as artefact reduction and metal artifact reduction algorithms, are being applied to cone-beam CT (CBCT) scans to enhance image quality and diagnosis. The studies also explore the influence of different factors, such as tooth-implant distance and root filling materials, on the effectiveness of these algorithms in detecting conditions like vertical root fractures.
content.da: Algoritmer til tandbilleddannelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i tandbilleddannelse for at forbedre nøjagtigheden ved at opdage forskellige tandsygdomme. Disse algoritmer, såsom artefaktreduktion og metalliske artefaktreduktionsalgoritmer, anvendes på cone-beam CT (CBCT) scanninger for at forbedre billedkvaliteten og diagnosen. Studierne undersøger også indflydelsen af forskellige faktorer, såsom tand-implantatafstand og rodfyldningsmaterialer, på effektiviteten af disse algoritmer til at opdage tilstande som vertikale rodfrakturer.
